title: Topic 004 Question 110
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a Microsoft Defender External Attack Surface Management (Defender EASM) resource named EASM1. EAMS1 contains the inventory assets shown in the following table.
Which assets are scanned daily, and which assets will display in the default dashboard charts? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
